column4: Hello, I'm looking for a distribution as a server and am interested in ubuntu. I saw ubuntu released a server build. Where can I read about this, and is it suited to run as server?
it is debian based and functions as you wish it to (as a server)
that is what I reasoned too. except, will there be security fixes as with debian? and saw leonel just pasted the release notes of it :)
breezy will have security fixes for 18 months
